activities: Sea Island receives information from customers who book reservations, visit our resort, register for our services, or make purchases on our websites, as well as information from potential customers who make inquiries about our resort and services.   We also receive personal information from current and potential employees and independent contractors, when they apply for an open position, inquire about work opportunities or otherwise.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer, client, organization, visitor, employee and independent contractor data received via email, fax, and through the website
recoursemech: EU and/or Swiss data protection authorities
